name: Cse2122
body:
Instructor: Ankita Sikdar

Email Id: sikdar.6@osu.edu

Class hours : Tues Wed Thurs Fri 9.35am-10.55am

Class location : Baker Systems 180

Office hours : Wed 3-5pm, Thurs 12-1pm

Office location : Caldwell Lab 418

**Course Contents**

[Syllabus](http://ankitasikdar.github.io/cse2122/lecture/syllabus.html)

[Drawbacks of object orientation] (http://ankitasikdar.github.io/cse2122/lecture/drawbacks-of-object-orientation.html)

**Midterms**

First midterm on 6/25/2013
* Closed book,closed notes
* Syllabus-materials covered in class till 6/21/2013

Second midterm on 7/12/2013
* Closed book,closed notes
* Syllabus-materials covered in class till 7/11/2013

**IMPORTANT**
Third midterm (OPTIONAL) on 7/25/2013
* Closed book,closed notes
* Syllabus-materials covered in class till 7/24/2013
* I am going to use best of two out of the three midterms. This is a chance to improve your scores!
